# Problem 1

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")
summary(instacart)
insta_df = instacart
```

## How many aisles are there and which aisles are the most items ordered from?
```{r}
num_aisle = insta_df %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarise(total_num = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total_num))

nrow(num_aisle)

names(which.max(table(insta_df$aisle)))

```
